snippet: Han Seok-woo of the Korea Trade-Investment Promotion Agency was kidnapped on Sunday by four gunmen, officials at the South Korean Foreign Ministry said.
abstract: South Korean government says gunmen have kidnapped South Korean trade official Han Seok-woo in Tripoli, Libya.
lead_paragraph: Han Seok-woo of the Korea Trade-Investment Promotion Agency was kidnapped on Sunday by four gunmen, officials at the South Korean Foreign Ministry said.

headline.main: South Korean Trade Official Abducted in Libyan Capital
